entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
